TopicTitle: Help Me! Kopernicus and Real Solar System aren't working!!!

Articles.Content:
I have a big problem... I am trying to use Real Solar System in KSP, but if RRS and Kopernicus are both in the Gamedata directory, the starter loading screen with the pictures and everything happens, then it goes to the solar system in the bottom right corner loading screen forever... I have been using RRS without the planet textures but it's really not the same. Please help.

Thanks!
You’re going to need to give more detail than that. What version of KSP, Kopernicus and RSS are you using? Where are the log files? What other mods are you using?

Check And make sure that You have the correct version of Kopernicus installed (1.11.1 I assume)
If this doesn't work, Go to the Kopernicus bleeding edge page and get the most recent version (its updated more often and bugs can be reported and fixed quickly compared to the regular version).

 

Edited April 5, 2021 by Rambow_Ninja94

On 3/30/2021 at 10:31 PM, Uhtred said:

if RRS and Kopernicus are both in the Gamedata directory, the starter loading screen with the pictures and everything happens, then it goes to the solar system in the bottom right corner loading screen forever...

Often the solution is, "Wait longer." Some planet packs include a lot of data. How long is "forever" in your case?
